```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(rWikiPathways)
library(magrittr)
```


# which species supported by wikipathways
```{r}
listOrganisms()
```

# how many pathways available for a species
```{r}
hs.pathways <- listPathways(organism = "Homo sapiens")
hs.pathways %>% str
```

```{r}
hs.pathways[1]
```

```{r}
hs.pathways$id %>% str
hs.pathways$url %>% str
hs.pathways$name %>% str
```

# get pathway information
```{r}
getPathwayInfo(pathway = "WP554")
```


```{r}
getXrefList(pathway = "WP554", systemCode = "L")
```

# retrive pathways
```{r}
gmpl <- getPathway(pathway = "WP554")
gmpl
```

# Identifier System Names and Codes
```{r}
BridgeDbR::getSystemCode(name = "Ensembl")

BridgeDbR::getSystemCode(name = "HGNC")
```
